name: Dinari VXX
description: The Dinari VXX dShares token (VXX.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the iPath® Series B S&P 500® VIX Short-Term Futures™ ETN (NYSE Arca: VXX). This Exchange-Traded Note (ETN) is designed to provide exposure to the S&P 500® VIX Short-Term Futures™ Index Total Return, which reflects market volatility expectations as implied by the Cboe Volatility Index (VIX). Each VXX.d token is fully backed by a corresponding VXX ETN share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, VXX.d offers investors access to a financial instrument that tracks short-term VIX futures, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
